Name: Toss the Dough
Description:
Rotate this action.
Deal 1 damage. If you are the Baker's partner, deal 3 damage instead.

Name: Slice and Dice
Description: Deal 2 damage divided as you choose between any number of enemies.

Name: Taste Test
Description:
Gain 3 vitality.
Rotate this action.
If you are the Baker's partner, spice your next action twice.

Name: Serve the Guests
Description:
Rotate this action.
If you are the Baker's partner, forage.

Name: Set the Table
Description:
Move all cards from your partner's field to your field.
Rotate any number of cards on your field.
Remove 2 time counters from each duration.

Name: Into the Oven
Description:
Deal 5 damage.
Spice your next action twice.
